name: Meet the Brothers
description: An informal introduction to Alpha Zeta. Come meet our members, learn about our values, and discover what makes our brotherhood unique.

name: Coffee Chats
description: One-on-one conversations with current members. Sign up for a time slot to learn more about specific career paths and member experiences.

name: Professional Workshop
description: An interactive workshop covering resume building, interview skills, and networking strategies. See firsthand how AZ prepares members for professional success.

name: Case Competition Night
description: Experience our signature AZ Groups format! Work alongside current members to solve a real business case and showcase your analytical skills.

name: Social Night
description: A casual evening to connect with members in a relaxed setting. Get to know the people behind the fraternity and see our brotherhood in action.

name: Final Round Interviews
description: Invitation-only interviews for candidates who have demonstrated exceptional fit throughout the rush process.

name: Bid Night
description: The culmination of rush! Selected candidates will receive their official invitations to join the Alpha Zeta family.
